textBox.richText: Gunter came in Thursday night...we had a boys weekend whilst Alli was in Atlanta. Max took a rest day on friday; Gunter and I did a bunch of laps through Eagle (left hand was pretty good). Broke for lunch (Gunter needed to do a conf call); I took a tumble above switchyard and busted the break on my binding. Skied tentatively after that...took it back home, and we figured out the screw had just popped off (whew!) Saturday was class for Max...and it was *WINDY*...just Arrow and Gemini to start. Gunter and I bussed it over to Jane, where they finally got the challenger running. Did a couple laps there (*insane* line, S-ing down to the goose and partway back), and then met up with James. Loads of fun busting through bumps and trees with the 3 of us. They ended up opening Gauge and Zephyr and Hi-Lo eventually...which helped thin out the crowds. On our way to get max, we had to do Brian’s....probably the best conditions I’ve ever seen it!!! Finally on Sunday, they opened back up Pano and Eagle. We ended up doing a Belle lap...conditions weren’t great in there...too crusty. The runs around the Black Coal cliff were good...packed down but not icy...so we did a bunch of laps in there.
